General.Name: Netas Telekomunikasyon AS
General.Description: Netas Telekomünikasyon A.S. provides information and communication technology solutions in Turkey and internationally. The company operates in Enterprise, Public, International, Technology, Telecom, and BDH segments. It manufactures and trades in telecommunication equipment; and provides project installation services, technical support, repair and maintenance services, IT, strategic outsourcing, implementation, and related services. The company offers solutions to its customers in core competencies, including mobile broadband, cyber security, cloud computing, business applications, and big data. It also offers end-to-end value added solutions, such as technology consulting and after-sales support services in countries, such as Bangladesh, Pakistan, and Nepal in the Asia-Pacific; Azerbaijan, Turkmenistan, Uzbekistan, and Kazakhstan in the Turkic Republics; Tunisia, Algeria, and Morocco in North Africa; and Saudi Arabia. The company serves financial institutions and telecommunication service providers; public and public security, energy, sports and entertainment, retail and fast consumption, and transport industries; and smart campuses and buildings. Netas Telekomünikasyon A.S. was founded in 1967 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.
